Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The Task class represents a task and holds a taskName, taskDescription, and checkers to if the task is recurring or not as well as methods for editing, completing, and cloning a task
    Author:
    rsthoma5

        Parameters:
        taskName - the name of the task to set
        taskDetails - the details of the task to set
        recurring - checker for if the task is recurring or not
        active - check for if the task is active or not
